column9: We went there hoping to find the usual flavours of asian cuisine but we got really impresed with the quality and quantity of the dishes! The fried duck with rice, coconut milk and curry is awesome! The price is really nice aswell!
Classic Thai food. Large portions and very tasty. Visited for lunch on a Saturday. It is a spacious place. Service could improve though!

Very good food. Chose the green chicken curry, rated very hot, and the heat was moderated by a creamy coconut sauce. Good size portion. Bad presentation. The dish was served on an oval plate with soup/sauce almost to the edges and an island of rice....More

I had dinner here on a Sunday.  I started with spring rolls, which are Vietnamese... they arrived piping hot, and were delicious.  My main course was fried duck, served with a garlic sauce.  (In my part of the USA, you really can't get duck at...More
Good food and nice ambiance but rather spicy food. The table are far apart enough to enable a serious conversation.

column7: Well spiced food to really good price
column9: We went to Ha Long for a business lunch. They had four dishes to choose from. I had the most spicy one and I was amazed that they actually had the courage to really spice it up. Well done! The portion size was also great...More

I eat here often. The food is for me the best asian food in Lund. The service is nice and always with a smile. Lunchtime there are 3 or 4 choices. After that you can order from the menu. Absolutely worth a visit !

We have visit the restaurant several times over the past 10 years and keep coming back. Great selection of food both vegetarian & meat. Lovely soups and noodle dishes always served with a smile!
Place was nice, food and waitresses were good. Price was little higher than expected for a ordinary dinner but i would go back again.
